channel.description: What is the shell? # prompt = superuser Display current time/date $ dateCalendar $ calsee disk space $ dfSee free memory $ freeClose Terminal $ exitor ctrl+dNavigation single files tree regardless of drives/ storage devices absolute pathnames begins with \ (root) & follows full path relative pathnames starts from working directory how to use a relative pathname $ cd ./bin (./ is implied) $ cd bin cd shortcuts $ cd -
